user_query: What are different perspectives on climate change policies

strategy_used: Graph Strategy: We are at the data-collection start of a Twitter-focused investigation into "different perspectives on climate change policies." The most important gaps are: (1) capturing the range of frames (economic, justice, scientific, national security, market-based) used by different actors; (2) identifying current/trending policy topics driving conversation; (3) mapping influential voices and networks that propagate each perspective; and (4) collecting representative tweets/conversations to illustrate each viewpoint. To fill these gaps efficiently and coherently, the next round should combine broad topical search queries, trend monitoring, timelines of representative accounts (activist, technocrat, business/philanthropy), and simple network endpoints to reveal affiliations/followers. Using multiple endpoints (search.php, trends.php, timeline.php, followers.php, affilates.php) satisfies the diversity requirement and produces complementary data: topical breadth (search), real-time salience (trends), direct voice samples (timelines), and network context (followers/affiliates).
